name: Whispering Foothills
story: There's a danger about this place - you sense it - increasing as you have ventured east across the grasslands.
You loosen your short sword at your side...
The job you picked up in Brist said to find World's End Tavern at the foot of the Whispering Foothills.
observe_details: Rolling plains transition to gentle slopes of the Whispering Foothills.
You see a dim light off in the distance.

landmarks.name: World's End Tavern
discovery_details: A haphazardly constructed tavern sits along the road just inside the first foothills.

landmarks.name: Abandoned Mine
discovery_details: The black maw of an large abandoned mine is visible over the crest of a small cliff face.
